g. stanley hall.gloss: United States child psychologist whose theories of child psychology strongly influenced educational psychology (1844-1924)

g suit.gloss: pressure suit worn by fliers and astronauts to counteract the forces of gravity and acceleration

gsa.gloss: a central management agency that sets Federal policy for Federal procurement and real property management and information resources management

gspc.gloss: an Algerian extremist Islamic offshoot of the Armed Islamic Group

synonyms.word: salafast group for call and combat

gsr.gloss: a change in the electrical properties of the skin in response to stress or anxiety
